Instanc = []¶
folder_path(code: int, path_aux='none')[source]¶

Function that defines the path of the DCM images folder :param code: path by 1) path_aux, 2) python input, 3) sys.argv[1], 4) dialog box, 5) excel table :param path_aux: default) none, folder path (code=1) or excel file path (code=5)
